titles.title: Urban Recovery and Growth Act
Urban Recovery and Growth Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the recovery zone economic development bonds for certain cities.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Urban and suburban affairs and development

bill.summary: Urban Recovery and Growth Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to authorize the issuance of economic development extension bonds for the purpose of economic development or refinancing the indebtedness of a city that has an average unemployment rate of not less than 150% of the national average in the preceding calendar year and that has lost at least 20% of its population between 2000 and 2010.
